title: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
Latest docker image. Happens on initial sync right after connecting to peers.

```
time="2020-02-17 15:46:59" level=error msg="gRPC panicked!" error="runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" stack="goroutine 21609 [running]:
```
